title: Jerry Dior, Designer Of MLB Logo, Dies At 82
teaser: The Major League Baseball logo has endured for almost 50 years, but it wasn't until just a few years ago that its creator was finally given credit. NPR's Audie Cornish and Melissa Block remember Jerry Dior who died May 10 at 82.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
